Author: Ester Dean

Quote: And then after a while he got me a job at the video store next door. I used to lock up the store and go next door and hang out all the time and watch movies and stuff.
Author: Jason Mewes

Quote: We're just going to come out and play. We know that we're supposed to win all the games, but if we don't, we just have to take the next game and focus on what we did wrong in the game before and just try to do better at the next game.
Author: Shaquille O'Neal

Quote: To tell an ally - who is shedding blood next to you - that you can't share information is a crime.
Author: David Warner

Quote: I used to write on pads with a pen but had trouble reading the words the next day. Years later, Bob Dylan taught me to just write and write on a laptop computer. Then I'd print that out. When it was time to write a song, I'd go through the pages and sing melodies to words that moved me.
Author: Leon Russell

Quote: The problem with feminism in the second wave was that we fought so much among ourselves, and I think we did so much damage to the movement... and I think the next wave, the third wave, is women mentoring younger women and women helping younger women to enter the political process and the writing world.
Author: Erica Jong

Quote: When Captain America is in a room full of Marvel superheroes, he is always Top Dog, even though his powers are pretty modest. He could be stood next to Thor, Iron Man, whoever. He is the one that everyone looks up to. To me, that is Superman, too. Even de-powered in the Legion arc, he was still Superman. Still Top Dog.
Author: Gary Frank

Quote: I truly believe that it's all of the hard times that make you step up to the next level, and that's what makes you a champion.
Author: Caroline Buchanan

Quote: We'll have four different gravitational wave windows open within the next 20 years, and each of them will see something different. We'll be probing the birth of the universe with this. The so-called 'inflationary era' of the universe. We'll be probing the birth of the fundamental forces and how they came into being.
Author: Kip Thorne

Quote: Conceptual art became the liberating idea that gave the art of the next 40 years its real impetus.
Author: Sol LeWitt

Quote: After one Olympics, if we invest in sports and say we will get a gold medal in the next Olympic, it doesn't work like that in sports. How it works is that you provide the infrastructure, provide education about nutrition and health.
Author: MS Dhoni

Quote: If you're looking for the safe choice, you shouldn't be supporting a black guy named Barack Obama to be the next leader of the free world.
Author: Barack Obama

Quote: Everything comes from your mind. You have to push yourself to get things going in your direction. If you are stubborn, nothing will help. If you are sad, nothing will help. You have to keep positive and to work very well for your next chance.
Author: Henrikh Mkhitaryan

Quote: Sex in a woman's world has the same currency a penny has in a man's. Every penny saved is a penny earned in one world and in the next every sexual adventure is a literary experience.
Author: Harry Golden

Quote: It was like I was Hannah Montana! I was a normal girl from Pittsburgh one minute and then a pop star the next!
Author: Daya

Quote: I love being on the road. I love that lifestyle, traveling city to city, rocking out and moving on to the next place.
Author: Caleb Johnson

Quote: I think singing and acting go hand in hand. Take an R&B singer: one song says, 'I love you,' the next is, 'Baby, don't leave me', the next is, 'If you leave me I don't care.' You have to drop in and out of different perspectives.
Author: Ice T

Quote: When I was about eight, I decided that the most wonderful thing, next to a human being, was a book.
Author: Margaret Walker

Quote: As soon as I accomplish one goal, I replace it with another one. I try not to get too far ahead of myself. I just say to myself, 'All right, well, I'd like to headline a tour,' and then when I get there, we'll see what my next goal is.
Author: Taylor Swift

Quote: Whether you be man or woman you will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
Author: James Allen

Quote: I don't think any day is worth living without thinking about what you're going to eat next at all times.
Author: Nora Ephron

Quote: Industrial opportunities are going to stem more from the biological sciences than from chemistry and physics. I see biology as being the greatest area of scientific breakthroughs in the next generation.
Author: George E. Brown, Jr.

Quote: When I was filming 'Premium Rush' in N.Y.C., I flew to L.A. to have a few general meetings. I sat down with Peter Cramer at Universal Studios and spoke about my life and career, and being that I'm such a goof, we spoke about how I really wanted to do a comedy next.
Author: Dania Ramirez

Quote: When I first signed to RCA, I was sort of excited and shocked that it was happening. But over the next couple of years, it really started to feel like that game you play when you're a little kid - the one where you put your nose on a bat and then spin around and try to walk.
Author: K. Flay

Quote: Parties are continually changing. The men of today give place to the men of tomorrow, and the idols which one set worship, the next destroy.
Author: John Tyler

Quote: If you are a successful woman, that can inspire the next generation.
Author: Susie Wolff

Quote: Here's my advice to my brown friends: The next time you're on an airplane in the U.S., just speak your mother tongue. That way, no one knows what you're saying. Life goes on.
Author: Maz Jobrani

Quote: Robotics has already made significant inroads in electronics assembly, with sewing trades - traditionally many countries' first entry point to the global trading system - likely to come next.
Author: Michael Spence

Quote: The American people should have a voice in the selection of their next Supreme Court Justice.
Author: Mitch McConnell

Quote: I felt cheated by the way grown-ups told me that the future of the world was bleak when I became a teenager in the 1970s. The pollution explosion was unstoppable. Global famine was inevitable. I genuinely want the next generation, my own kids, to know that actually it's possible that the future might be better than the past.
Author: Matt Ridley

Quote: Racing is a funny industry. One week you can be going terrible and the next week you're on top of the world. So you just keep showing up: I keep working harder to get more opportunities, but what do you do - that's life.
Author: Michelle Payne

Quote: If GE's strategy of investment in China is wrong, it represents a loss of a billion dollars, perhaps a couple of billion dollars. If it is right, it is the future of this company for the next century.
Author: Jack Welch

Quote: I was always at my best when I was learning, when I was curious. When I had yet to see past the next horizon.
Author: Reinhold Messner

Quote: Yes' is the mother of all positive words, next to 'love.' Maybe 'love' is the father of all positive words.
Author: Jason Mraz

Quote: People call me a perfectionist, but I'm not. I'm a rightist. I do something until it's right, and then I move on to the next thing.
Author: James Cameron

Quote: Next time I see you, remind me not to talk to you.
Author: Groucho Marx

Quote: If you're in a city where there's no clear startup community, the goal is not raise a bunch of money to fund a nonprofit; the goal is not get your government involved. The goal is start finding the other entrepreneurial leaders who are committed to being in your city over the next 20 years.
Author: Brad Feld

Quote: Then, I realized that there is an indigenous presence in the Solar System. It's us. So, then, I got to wondering what would happen if a more technologically advanced society moved next door to us, the way we moved next door to the American Indians.
Author: Sarah Zettel

Quote: Although I don't like the way the Chinese do business, I continue to do business in China. I have to. They're the next world power.
Author: Robert Kiyosaki

Quote: It's time to move on to the next step in the psychedelic revolution. We've reached a certain point, but we're not moving any more.
Author: Ken Kesey

Quote: With each game's release, I think the expectations get higher and higher for the next, and rightfully so.
Author: Scott Cawthon

Quote: Leaders come in many forms, with many styles and diverse qualities. There are quiet leaders and leaders one can hear in the next county. Some find strength in eloquence, some in judgment, some in courage.
Author: John W. Gardner

Quote: Donald Trump was in a tuxedo, standing next to his award: a statue of a palm tree, as tall as a toddler. It was 2010, and Trump was being honored by a charity - the Palm Beach Police Foundation - for his 'selfless support' of its cause. His support did not include any of his own money.
Author: David Fahrenthold

Quote: I think it's in our nature to try to get beyond that next horizon. I think that when we, as a species, are scratching that itch, we're actually following an evolutionary compulsion that is wired into us. I think good things come of it.
Author: Ron Howard

Quote: We shook up the industry with our landscape-changing deal to acquire Time Warner, the logical next step in our strategy to bring together world-class content with best-in-class distribution which will drive innovation and more choice for consumers.
Author: Randall L. Stephenson

Quote: I spent every night until four in the morning on my dissertation, until I came to the point when I could not write another word, not even the next letter. I went to bed. Eight o'clock the next morning I was up writing again.
Author: Abraham Pais

Quote: I can walk into Tower Records, go get my box set, take out my Steve Miller credit card, and the clerk will look at me and go, 'Thanks, next.'
Author: Steve Miller

Quote: When a regular guy like me starts getting attention, it's natural to want more. I wanted the next video to be bigger than the last.
Author: Bhuvan Bam

Quote: A very common thing these days is people show up and they ask us in the band to sign with a Sharpie right on their skin and they go get it tattooed the next day. Then they'll show up at another show and they'll have their tattoo.
Author: Jared Leto

Quote: A man can do only what he can do. But if he does that each day he can sleep at night and do it again the next day.
Author: Albert Schweitzer

Quote: Most of us fall in love with someone's persona and spend the next three to five years discovering who that person really is. If you can stay connected through that process of raw vulnerability, I think you have a shot at the prize of knowing and accepting another human being for who and what they really are after years of highs and lows.
Author: Jennifer Aniston

Quote: The more stories I told, the more I found I wanted to tell. There was always something left unsaid. I got hooked by my own impulse of 'Well, what's gonna happen next?'
Author: Chris Claremont

Quote: That's what I like about acting. When you're preparing for a role, you do your research, and the bonus is you get to learn these skills. Now, it's on to whatever the next thing is I have to learn.
Author: Parminder Nagra

Quote: Would we prefer to be lifting it? Of course we would. You can't look back, we have to look forward and say what are we going to do get it back next year.
Author: David Gill

Quote: People and companies make mistakes. I guarantee we'll make a mistake next quarter. So what? Businesses make mistakes. Hopefully smaller, and fewer.
Author: Jamie Dimon

Quote: Cultural industries will be the next engine for growth after real estate, and Wanda will make cultural industries our long-term focus.
Author: Wang Jianlin

Quote: When I worked at Microsoft, I got to go and visit a bunch of different companies. Probably a hundred different companies a year. You'd see all the different ways they'd work. The guys who did Ventura Publisher one day, and then United Airlines the next. You'd see the 12 guys in Texas doing Doom, and then you'd go see Aetna life insurance.
Author: Gabe Newell

Quote: It is an honor to serve as the Ad Council's next Chair of the Board of Directors. I am deeply committed to its mission of creating campaigns that improve everyday lives. I look forward to working with the Ad Council team and Board to continue to shine a light on the most important social issues of our day.
Author: Margo Georgiadis

Quote: The late sixties and early seventies were kind of a breeding ground for exciting new sounds because easy listening and folk were kind of taking over the airwaves. I think it was a natural next step to take that blissful, easy-going sound and strangle the life out of it.
Author: Alice Cooper

Quote: How I thrive is very simple. My son brought my perspective back to focusing on and appreciating the simple things in life. It's about just being with my family - whether that's waking up in bed next to my husband under the comforter and just hugging or walking down the street and holding my son's hand.
Author: Tia Mowry

Quote: The workings of the human heart are the profoundest mystery of the universe. One moment they make us despair of our kind, and the next we see in them the reflection of the divine image.
Author: Charles W. Chesnutt

Quote: There's so much pressure on women to have it all together. There's always this 'next, next, next.' I hope Glossier encourages women to be O.K. wherever you are. Just, everyone, relax!
Author: Emily Weiss

Quote: I'm really bad with answering questions. Usually, I don't even answer them. I try to find inspiration inside of the question. I think, and I jump from one beam of inspiration or energy to the next, as opposed to explaining the energy.
Author: Kanye West

Quote: With my music, I don't have to stay in one lane. One day I'm in Motown, and the next day I'm in reggae.
Author: Estelle

Quote: Monica Seles: I'd hate to be next door to her on her wedding night.
Author: Peter Ustinov

Quote: In the landscape of extinction, precision is next to godliness.
Author: Samuel Beckett

Quote: If you believe that how you do your work is as influential as the work you do, then a theatre rehearsal, which is a microcosm of the world, is the perfect place to model social change because if it doesn't work this time, you can try again on the next production.
Author: Phyllida Lloyd

Quote: There's this idea of America that some people have to win and some have to lose, so certain things are in place to make this happen. Some people have to be the next legislators and political elites, and some have to fill the prisons and work in McDonald's. That's how America works. It's a machine which needs people up top and people down low.
Author: Jaylen Brown

Quote: To be able to take the next generation, my daughters and my granddaughters, to better understand and respect the people in the Outback and experience the wonders of our country, would definitely be one of my favourite duties.
Author: Gina Rinehart

Quote: You don't just have a story - you're a story in the making, and you never know what the next chapter's going to be. That's what makes it exciting.
Author: Dan Millman

Quote: Believe me, the next step is a currency crisis because there will be a rejection of the dollar, the rejection of the dollar is a big, big event, and then your personal liberties are going to be severely threatened.
Author: Ron Paul

Quote: In 1995, world military spending totaled nearly $800 billion. If we redirected just $40 billion of those resources over the next 10 years to fighting poverty, all of the world's population would enjoy basic social services, such as education, health care, nutrition, reproductive health, clean water and sanitation.
Author: scar Arias

Quote: It is our job, as members of parliament, to legislate with an eye to the long term future, to look over the horizon beyond the next election and ensure that as far as we can what we do today will make Australia a better place, a safer place, for future generations to live in.
Author: Malcolm Turnbull

Quote: I don't think that the next generation should fear just being who they are rather than confirming to an expectation of what they are meant to be.
Author: Jacinda Ardern

Quote: Always do whatever's next.
Author: George Carlin

Quote: Mars, the second planet from the sun in our solar system is touted to be the next home for human race in the coming decades if the research and understanding of the planet is cracked by the bigwigs of the science world.
Author: Shweta Basu Prasad

Quote: I can remember when I was just, like, about four years old in Compton, and my mother would have me stack 45s, stack about ten of them, and when one would finish, the next record would drop. It was like I was DJ'ing for the house, picking out certain songs and so this song would go after that song.
Author: Dr. Dre

Quote: I can't feel bad about being who I am, just like the girl next to me can't feel bad about being who she is. Because a rose can never be a sunflower, and a sunflower can never be a rose.
Author: Miranda Kerr

Quote: It is not always by plugging away at a difficulty and sticking to it that one overcomes it; often it is by working on the one next to it. Some things and some people have to be approached obliquely, at an angle.
Author: Andre Gide

Quote: I did not enter the industry to create a certain image. People happened to see me as the friend/sister/daughter next door. I like that association very much. It's close to what I am in real life. As for films, I just focus on the job.
Author: Kajal Aggarwal

Quote: In my personal life, I was quite a different Boy Next Door than the one Mr. and Mrs. Middle America imagined me to be.
Author: Tab Hunter

Quote: Usually, I don't revisit a scene once shot. However, in 'Gentleman,' every morning on the sets, I had to revisit the last four scenes and then shoot for the next set of scenes.
Author: Nani

Quote: The recount in Michigan is over. The election is over. Our next president is Donald J. Trump. Winning once was nice. But winning twice was huge.
Author: Ronna McDaniel

Quote: Next to knowing when to seize an opportunity, the most important thing in life is to know when to forego an advantage.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quote: I don't really remember, but I'm positive that whenever I cried, my mother gave me something to eat. I'm sure that whenever I had a fight with the little girl next door, or it was raining and I couldn't go out, or I wasn't invited to a birthday party, my mother gave me a piece of candy to make me feel better.
Author: Jean Nidetch

Quote: If I do a bad dive, that's in the past. Move on. The next dive is a completely separate thing. It's just about being really present in a particular moment.
Author: Tom Daley

Quote: I'm interested in new worlds, new universes, new challenges. I always said the only reason to make a film is not for the result but for what you learn for the next one.
Author: Alfonso Cuaron

Quote: My mother and father, with my newborn brother and me in the backseat of the 1938 Ford sedan that would be our family car for the next decade, moved to that hastily constructed Army ammunition depot called Igloo, on the alkaline and sagebrush landscape of far southwestern South Dakota. I was three years old.
Author: Tom Brokaw

Quote: I can imagine myself on my death-bed, spent utterly with lust to touch the next world, like a boy asking for his first kiss from a woman.
Author: Aleister Crowley

Quote: When I'm sitting around, I'm thinking about how I can make my next professional career move, but more than anything, I'm thinking about the meaning of life and how fleeting it is.
Author: Charlamagne tha God

Quote: I'm aware of the fact that people that are watching to see what I do next - It's challenging to make the best decisions, and I don't always get it right.
Author: Renee Elise Goldsberry

Quote: I remember when I watched 'Hellraiser' with my mother. She cried when she saw my name in the opening credits, and I had to tell her that that was the happiest she was going to be for the next two hours.
Author: Clive Barker

Quote: Investors are impatient and they are also desperate for the 'next big thing,' and they are not paying attention to the fact that the 'next big thing' can be an economic crisis that they have created by being very irresponsible with their power.
Author: Carmen Busquets

Quote: Not all ideas are like a twinkling star in the sky, and you get inspired to make a record the next day.
Author: Mike Patton

Quote: We've been playing in the sandbox of creation for millions of years. We ruin one environment, we move on to the next - manifest destiny. Now it's hitting us collectively: Our mother's life is in our hands.
Author: Anohni

Quote: Every successful person I have heard of has done the best he could with the conditions as he found them, and not waited until next year for better.
Author: E. W. Howe

Quote: Blessed are the curious for they will have adventures.
Author: Lovelle Drachman

Quote: A great way to learn about your country is to leave it.
Author: Henry Rollins

Quote: Travel opens your mind as few other things do. It is its own form of hypnotism, and I am forever under its spell.
Author: Libba Bray

Quote: We must travel in the direction of our fear.
Author: John Berryman

Quote: Live your life by a compass, not a clock.
Author: Stephen Covey

Quote: You dont have to be rich to travel well.
Author: Eugene Fodor

Quote: Jobs fill your pocket, but adventures fill your soul.
Author: Jamie Lyn Beatty

Quote: If you think adventures are dangerous, try routine: its lethal.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quote: I would rather own a little and see the world than own the world and see a little of it.
Author: Alexander Sattler

Quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experiences.
Author: Paulo Coelho

Quote: People travel because it teaches them things they could learn no other way.
Author: Lance Morrow

Quote: To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, draw closer, to find each other, and to feel. That is the purpose of life.
Author: Walter Mitty (The Secret Life of Walter Mitty)

Quote: I travel not to cross countries off a list, but to ignite passionate affairs with destinations.
Author: Nyssa P. Chopra

Quote: Like all great travelers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quote: Dont ask for security, ask for adventure. Better to live 30 years full of adventure than 100 years safe.
Author: Jim Rohn

Quote: I am not the same, having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.
Author: Mary Anne Radmacher

Quote: Some beautiful paths cant be discovered without getting lost.
Author: Erol Ozan

Quote: Once in a while it really hits people that they dont have to experience the world in the way they have been told to.
Author: Alan Keightley

Quote: There is a kind of magicness about going far away and then coming back all changed.
Author: Kate Douglas Wiggin

Quote: If you reject the food, ignore the customs, fear the religion and avoid the people, you might better stay at home.
Author: James Michener

Quote: Ill look back on this and smile because it was life and I decided to live it.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: When youre traveling, you are what you are, right there and then. People dont have your past to hold against you. No yesterdays on the road.
Author: William Least-Heat Moon

Quote: Every traveler has a home of his own, and he learns to appreciate it the more from his wandering.
Author: Charles Dickens

Quote: Our happiest moments as tourists always seem to come when we stumble upon one thing while in pursuit of something else.
Author: Lawrence Block

Quote: This is a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born and never get to see any of it. I dont want to be most of us.
Author: Oberyn Martell (Game of Thrones)

Quote: Work, Save, Travel, Repeat
Author: Anonymous

Quote: If not now, when?
Author: Primo Levi

Quote: Life is short and the world is wide.
Author: Simon Raven

Quote: Oh, the places youll go!
Author: Dr. Seuss

Quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
Author: J.R.R. Tolkien

Quote: Dont call it a dream, call it a plan.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Life is a journey, not a destination.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Collect moments, not things.
Author: Karen Salmansohn

Quote: Paris is always a good idea.
Author: Sabrina, Julia Ormond

Quote: The journey not the arrival matters.
Author: T.S. Eliot

Quote: To travel is to live.
Author: Hans Christian Andersen

Quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: Be fearless in the pursuit of what sets your soul on fire.
Author: Jennifer Lee

Quote: Travel is the only thing you buy that makes you richer.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Dare to live the life youve always wanted.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: In the end, we only regret the chances we didnt take.
Author: Lewis Carroll

Quote: Im in love with cities Ive never been to and people Ive never met.
Author: Melody Truong

Quote: I love the feeling of being anonymous in a city Ive never been before.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: I havent been everywhere, but its on my list.
Author: Susan Sontag

Quote: Adventure may hurt you but monotony will kill you.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Take nothing but pictures, leave nothing but footprints, kill nothing but time.
Author: Aliyyah Eniath

Quote: I dont know where Im going, but Im on my way.
Author: Carl Sandburg

Quote: Theres no time to be bored in a world as beautiful as this.
Author: Matt Hogan

Quote: Live life with no excuses, travel with no regret.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quote: When was the last time you did something for the first time?
Author: John C. Maxwell

Quote: Once a year, go someplace youve never been before.
Author: Instructions for Life

Quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.
Author: Oprah Winfrey

Quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
Author: Gustav Flaubert

Quote: Traveling - it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
Author: Ibn Battuta

Quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other places, other lives, other souls.
Author: Anais Nin

Quote: A journey is best measured in friends, rather than miles.
Author: Tim Cahill

Quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
Author: Neale Donald Walsch

Quote: Of all the books in all the world, the best stories are found between the pages of a passport.
Author: Saber Ben Hassen

Quote: Actually, the best gift you could have given her was a lifetime of adventures.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: To awaken quite alone in a strange town is one of the pleasantest sensations in the world.
Author: Freya Stark

Quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
Author: Aldous Huxley

Quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Author: Andre Gide

Quote: The world is a book, and those who do not travel read only one page.
Author: Saint Augustine

Quote: Better to see something once than hear about it a thousand times.
Author: Asian Proverb

Quote: We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.
Author: Robyn Yong

Quote: We wander for distraction but we travel for fulfillment.
Author: Hilaire Belloc

Quote: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.
Author: Anita Desai

Quote: Travel doesnt become adventure until you leave yourself behind.
Author: Marty Rubin

Quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Travel. As much as you can. As far as you can. As long as you can. Lifes not meant to be lived in one place.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: We travel for romance, we travel for architecture, and we travel to be lost.
Author: Ray Bradbury

Quote: If we were meant to stay in one place, wed have roots instead of feet.
Author: Rachel Wolchin

Quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travels sake. The great affair is to move.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: Wanderlust consumed her; foreign hearts and exotic minds compelled her. She had a gypsy soul and a vibrant hope for the unknown.
Author: D. Marie

Quote: We are torn between a nostalgia for the familiar and an urge for the foreign and strange. As often as not, we are homesick most for the places we have never known.
Author: Carson McCullers

Quote: I have found out that there aint no surer way to find out whether you like people or hate them than to travel with them.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: The more I traveled the more I realized that fear makes strangers of people who should be friends.
Author: Shirley MacLaine

Quote: When preparing to travel, lay out all your clothes and all your money. Then take half the clothes and twice the money.
Author: Susan Heller

Quote: I travel because it makes me realize how much I havent seen, how much Im not going to see, and how much I still need to see.
Author: Carew Papritz

Quote: Every dreamer knows that it is entirely possible to be homesick for a place youve never been to, perhaps more homesick than for familiar ground.
Author: Judith Thurman

Quote: Now more than ever do I realize that I will never be content with a sedentary life, that I will always be haunted by thoughts of a sun-drenched elsewhere.
Author: Isabelle Eberhardt

Quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm, and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
Author: Jawaharial Nehru

Quote: And then there is the most dangerous risk of all  the risk of spending your life not doing what you want on the bet you can buy yourself the freedom to do it later.
Author: Randy Komisar

Quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: To my mind, the greatest reward and luxury of travel is to be able to experience everyday things as if for the first time, to be in a position in which almost nothing is so familiar it is taken for granted.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: But the most beautiful things in life are just not things. Theyre people and places, memories and pictures. Theyre feeling and moments and smiles and laughter.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Travel is like love, mostly because its a heightened state of awareness, in which we are mindful, receptive, undimmed by familiarity and ready to be transformed. That is why the best trips, like the best love affairs, never really end.
Author: Pico Iyer

Quote: You get a strange feeling when youre about to leave a place. Youll not only miss the people you love but youll miss the person you are now at this time and this place, because youll never be this way ever again.
Author: Azar Nafisi

Quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness, and many of our people need it sorely on these accounts. Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all ones lifetime.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: We travel because we need to, because distance and difference are the secret tonics of creativity. When we get home, home is still the same. But something in our mind has been changed, and that changes everything.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: You will never be completely at home again, because part of your heart always will be elsewhere. That is the price you pay for the richness of loving and knowing people in more than one place.
Author: Miriam Adeney

Quote: Travel isnt always pretty. It isnt always comfortable. Sometimes it hurts, it even breaks your heart. But thats okay. The journey changes you; it should change you. It leaves marks on your memory, on your consciousness, on your heart, and on your body. You take something with you. Hopefully, you leave something good behind.
Author: Anthony Bourdain

Quote: Why do you go away? So that you can come back. So that you can see the place you came from with new eyes and extra colors. And the people there see you differently, too. Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving.
Author: Terry Pratchett

Quote: Perhaps travel cannot prevent bigotry, but by demonstrating that all peoples cry, laugh, eat, worry, and die, it can introduce the idea that if we try and understand each other, we may even become friends.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: The very basic core of a mans living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.
Author: Chris McCandles (Into the Wild)

Quote: Theres an opposite to dj vu. They call it jamais vu. Its when you meet the same people or visit places, again and again, but each time is the first. Everybody is always a stranger. Nothing is ever familiar.
Author: Chuck Palahniuk

Quote: Traveling is a brutality. It forces you to trust strangers and to lose sight of all that familiar comforts of home and friends. You are constantly off balance. Nothing is yours except the essential things. Air, sleep, dreams, the sea, the sky. All things tending towards the eternal or what we imagine of it.
Author: Cesare Pavese

Quote: But thats the glory of foreign travel, as far as I am concerned. I dont want to know what people are talking about. I cant think of anything that excites a greater sense of childlike wonder than to be in a country where you are ignorant of almost everything. Suddenly you are five years old again. You cant read anything, you have only the most rudimentary sense of how things work, you cant even reliably cross a street without endangering your life. Your whole existence becomes a series of interesting guesses.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: One fine day, it will be your turn. You will leave homes, cities and countries to pursue grander ambitions. You will leave friends, lovers and possibilities for the chance to roam the world and make deeper connections. You will defy your fear of change, hold your head high and do what you once thought was unthinkable: walk away. And it will be scary. At first. But what I hope youll find in the end is that in leaving, you dont just find love, adventure or freedom. More than anything, you find you.
Author: Isa Garcia

Quote: Adventure is worthwhile.
Author: Aesop

Quote: Travel teaches how to see.
Author: African proverb

Quote: The impulse to travel is one of the hopeful symptoms of life.
Author: Agnes Repplier

Quote: Our travels express, however inarticulately, an understanding of what life might be outside of the constraints of work and of the struggle for survival.
Author: Alain de Botton

Quote: Once in a while it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told to.
Author: Alan Keightley

Quote: I am truly a 'lone traveler' and have never belonged to my country, my home, my friends, or even my immediate family, with my whole heart. In the face of all this, I have never lost a sense of distance and the need for solitude.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: I love to travel, but hate to arrive
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: The woman who follows the crowd will usually go no further than the crowd. The woman who walks alone is likely to find herself in places no one has ever been before.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: For the born traveler, traveling is a besetting vice. Like other vices, it is imperious, demanding its victim's time, money, energy and the sacrifice of comfort.
Author: Aldous Huxley

Quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.
Author: Aldous Huxley

Quote: One main factor in the upward trend of animal life has been the power of wandering.
Author: Alfred North Whitehead

Quote: The traveled mind is the mind educated from exclusiveness and egotism.
Author: Amos Bronson Alcott

Quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.
Author: Anais Nin

Quote: Wandering re-establishes the original harmony which once existed between man and the universe.
Author: Anatole France

Quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
Author: Andre Gide

Quote: I like who I am when I'm traveling better than the person I am when I wake up every morning in my own house.
Author: Andrew Zimmern

Quote: Try new things, meet new people, and look beyond what's right in front of you. Those are the keys to understanding this amazing world we live in.
Author: Andrew Zimmern

Quote: I am one of those who never knows the direction of my journey until I have almost arrived.
Author: Anna Louise Strong

Quote: We travel not to escape life, but for life not to escape us.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Travel is the only thing you buy that makes you richer
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Travel as much as you can. As far as you can. As long as you can. Life's not meant to be lived in one place.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: The most dangerous risk of all: the risk of spending your life not doing what you want on the bet you can buy yourself the freedom to do it later.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: I would gladly live out of a suitcase if it meant I could see the world.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: He who would travel happily must travel light.
Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

Quote: Great problems are sometimes best solved by long walks.
Author: Arabic proverb

Quote: Travel has taught me the journey is the destination.
Author: Asmgaiter

Quote: Travel teaches toleration.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember and remember more than I have seen.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quote: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door. You step onto the road, and if you don't keep your feet, there's no knowing where you might be swept off to.
Author: Bilbo Baggins

Quote: I can't think of anything that excites a greater sense of childlike wonder than to be in a country where you are ignorant of almost everything.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: Distance changes utterly when you take the world on foot.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: Traveling is more fun-hell, life is more fun-if you can treat it as a series of impulses.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: There is something about the momentum of travel that makes you want to just keep moving, to never stop.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: To my mind, the greatest reward and luxury of travel is to be able to experience everyday things as if for the first time, to be in a position in which almost nothing is so familiar it is taken for granted.
Author: Bill Bryson

Quote: Soul travel can be a general expansion of awareness and knowingness or conscious experience of the heavenly worlds.
Author: Bob Hayes

Quote: Travel -  the best way to be lost and found all at the same time.
Author: Brenna Smith

Quote: To travel is to possess the world.
Author: Burton Holmes

Quote: Heroes take journeys to confront dragons and discover the treasure of their true selves.
Author: Carol Pearson

Quote: We are torn between a nostalgia for the familiar and an urge for the foreign and strange. As often as not, we are homesick most for the places we have never known.
Author: Carson McCullers

Quote: I travel a lot; I hate having my life disrupted by routine.
Author: Caskie Stinnett

Quote: Traveling is a brutality. It forces you to trust strangers and to lose sight of all that familiar comfort of home and friends. You are constantly off balance. Nothing is yours except the essential things — air, sleep, dreams, the sea, the sky — all things tending towards the eternal or what we imagine of it.
Author: Cesare Pavese

Quote: If you wish to travel far and fast, travel light. Take off all your envies, jealousies, unforgiveness, selfishness and fears.
Author: Cesare Pavese

Quote: One always begins to forgive a place as soon as it's left behind.
Author: Charles Dickens

Quote: Let me be a free man; free to travel, free to stop, free to work.
Author: Chief Joseph

Quote: I think you travel to search and you come back home to find yourself there.
Author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

Quote: One learns more from traveling ten thousand miles than from reading ten thousand scrolls.
Author: Chinese Proverb

Quote: Don't listen to what they say. Go see.
Author: Chinese proverb

Quote: Only he that has traveled the road knows where the holes are deep.
Author: Chinese proverb

Quote: When overseas you learn more about your own country, than you do the place you're visiting.
Author: Clint Borgen

Quote: Keep your eye on the horizon and your nose to the wind
Author: Clint Eastwood

Quote: I am going away with him to an unknown country where I shall have no past and no name, and where I shall be born again with a new face and an untried heart.
Author: Colette

Quote: Once a year go someplace you've never been before.
Author: DALAI LAMA

Quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
Author: Danny Kaye

Quote: And that's the wonderful thing about family travel: It provides you with experiences that will remain locked forever in the scar tissue of your mind.
Author: Dave Barry

Quote: I don't know where I'm going but I promise it won't be boring.
Author: David Bowie

Quote: Climb the mountain so you can see the world, not so the world can see you.
Author: David McCullough Jr.

Quote: Travel far enough, you meet yourself.
Author: David Mitchell

Quote: I read; I travel; I become.
Author: Derek Walcott

Quote: When a man is a traveller, the world is his house and the sky is his roof, where he hangs his hat is his home, and all the people are his family.
Author: Drew Bundini Brown

Quote: I may not have gone where I intended to go, but I think I have ended up where I intended to be.
Author: Douglas Adams

Quote: Oh the places you'll go.
Author: Dr. Seuss

Quote: Most often we travel roundtrip. If honest, though, we fantasize about the day we will just keep going, one way with no return. We long for the new beginning we imagine just over the horizon. Problem is, the horizon is always still there, just out of reach. So we finally begin to travel inward. And there we discover the same horizon.,e dawson richards
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: We discover people are the same everywhere wetravel. But we discover we are not.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: The gods speak loudest in the quietest of places.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: Your destination is not nearly as important as getting to better know your traveling companion. That's especially true if you are traveling by yourself.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: Let your heart guide you on your journey. It whispers, so listen closely.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: Travel to great cities stirs a nostalgia for what is best and most noble in humanity.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: I find myself nostalgic for places I've never been and missing people I've never met.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: Most often we travel round trip. If honest, though, we fantasize about the day we will just keep going, one way with no return.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: We long for the new beginning we imagine just over the horizon. Problem is, the horizon is always still there, just out of reach. So we finally begin to travel inward. And there we discover the same horizon.
Author: e dawson richards

Quote: Truly great travel experiences never end, but continue on with us, becoming a part of who we are. Some portion of our soul is made up of the places we have visited and the people we meet on our journeys.
Author: e. dawson richards

Quote: For whatever you lose / (like a you or a me), / it's always ourselves / we find in the sea.
Author: e.e. cummings

Quote: There is a peculiar pleasure in riding out into the unknown. A pleasure which no second journey on the same trail ever affords.
Author: Edith Durham

Quote: To travel is worth any cost or sacrifice.
Author: Elizabeth Gilbert

Quote: It is good to have an end to journey toward; but it is the journey that matters, in the end.
Author: Ernest Hemingway

Quote: There is freedom waiting for you, on the breezes of the sky. And you ask What if I fall? Oh but my darling, what if you fly?
Author: Erin Hanson

Quote: You can't understand a city without using its public transportation system.
Author: Erol Ozan

Quote: Through travel I first became aware of the outside world; it was through travel that I found my own introspective way into becoming a part of it.
Author: Eudora Welty

Quote: You don't have to be rich to travel well.
Author: Eugene Fodor

Quote: Experience, travel — these are as education in themselves.
Author: Euripides

Quote: The sea is dangerous and its storms terrible, but these obstacles have never been sufficient reason to remain ashore.
Author: Ferdinand Magellan

Quote: Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and celebrate the journey.
Author: Fitzhugh Mullan

Quote: When a traveler returneth home, let him not leave the countries where he has traveled altogether behind.
Author: Francis Bacon

Quote: Without new experiences, something inside of us sleeps. The sleeper must awaken.
Author: Frank Herbert

Quote: To awaken quite alone in a strange town is one of the pleasantest sensations in the world.
Author: Freya Stark

Quote: The whole object of travel is not to set foot on foreign land; it is at last to set foot on one's own country as a foreign land.
Author: G.K. Chesterton

Quote: Keep things on your trip in perspective, and you'll be amazed at the perspective you gain on things back home while you're away ... One's little world is put into perspective by the bigger world out there.
Author: Gail Rubin Bereny

Quote: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad.
Author: George Bernard Shaw

Quote: If you don't know where you're going, any road will take you there.
Author: George Harrison

Quote: The whole object of travel is not to set foot on foreign land; it is at last to set foot on one's own country as a foreign land.
Author: G.K. Chesterton

Quote: The traveller sees what he sees. The tourist sees what he has come to see.
Author: G.K. Chesterton

Quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
Author: Gustave Flaubert

Quote: Though the way is full of perils and the goal is far out of sight,  there is no road to which there is no end. Do not despair.
Author: Hafiz

Quote: To travel is to live.
Author: Hans Christian Andersen

Quote: To move, to breathe, to fly, to float/To gain all while you give/ To roam the roads of lands remote/To travel is to live.
Author: Hans Christian Andersen

Quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: The man who goes alone can start today; but he who travels with another must wait till that other is ready.
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quote: One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
Author: Henry Miller

Quote: It is not down in any map; true places never are.
Author: Herman Melville

Quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
Author: Hilaire Belloc

Quote: There is no happiness for the person who does not travel. For the gods are the friend of the traveler. Therefore wander!
Author: Hindu

Quote: When you doubt your power, you give power to your doubt.
Author: Honore de Balzac

Quote: Traveling - it makes you speechless and then turns you into a storyteller
Author: Ibn Battuta

Quote: Now more than ever do I realize that I will never be content with a sedentary life, that I will always be haunted by thoughts of a sun-drenched elsewhere.
Author: Isabelle Eberhardt

Quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
Author: J. R. R. Tolkien

Quote: A good holiday is one that is spent among people whose notions of time are vaguer than yours.
Author: J.B. Priestley

Quote: I met a lot of people in Europe. I even encountered myself.
Author: James Baldwin

Quote: If you reject the food, ignore the customs, fear the religion and avoid the people, you might better stay at home.
Author: James Michener

Quote: Here's to freedom, cheers to art. Here's to having an excellent adventure and may the stopping never start.
Author: Jason Mraz

Quote: We live in a wonderful world that is full of beauty, charm and adventure. There is no end to the adventures we can have if only we seek them with our eyes open.
Author: Jawaharial Nehru

Quote: Travel will make you appreciate the familiarity of home. It will restore your sense of childlike wonder for what was already there. And when you return, you will remember what it is to truly be alive again.
Author: Jessica Yurasek

Quote: Not what we have but what we enjoy constitutes our abundance.
Author: John Petit-Senn

Quote: People don't take trips — trips take people.
Author: John Steinbeck

Quote: A journey is like marriage. The certain way to be wrong is to think you control it.
Author: John Steinbeck

Quote: If your ship doesn't come in, swim out to it.
Author: Jonathan Winters

Quote: A person needs at intervals to separate from family and companions and go to new places. One must go without familiars in order to be open to influences, to change.
Author: Katherine Butler Hathaway

Quote: Travel, change, interest, excitement! The whole world before you, and a horizon that's always changing!
Author: Kenneth Grahame

Quote: Embrace the detours.
Author: Kevin Charbonneau

Quote: Bizarre travel plans are dancing lessons from God.
Author: Kurt Vonnegut

Quote: Unexpected travel suggestions are dancing lessons from God.
Author: Kurt Vonnegut, Jr.

Quote: A good traveler has no fixed plans and is not intent on arriving.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The further one goes the less one knows.
Author: Lao-tzu

Quote: An English man does not travel to see English men.
Author: Laurence Sterne

Quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
Author: Lawrence Durrell

Quote: Find life experiences and swallow them whole. Travel. Meet many people. Go down some dead ends and explore dark alleys. Try everything. Exhaust yourself in the glorious pursuit of life.
Author: Lawrence K. Fish

Quote: I soon realized that no journey carries one far unless, as it extends into the world around us, it goes an equal distance into the world within.
Author: Lillian Smith

Quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.
Author: Lin Yutang

Quote: Traveling is like flirting with life. It's like saying, 'I would stay and love you, but I have to go; this is my station.'
Author: Lisa St. Aubin de Teran

Quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeking new landscapes but in having new eyes.
Author: Marcel Proust

Quote: Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
Author: Maria Robinson

Quote: Adventure is a path. Real adventure forces you to have firsthand encounters with the world. The world the way it is, not the way you imagine it. Your body will collide with the earth and you will bear witness. In this way you will be compelled to grapple with the limitless kindness and bottomless cruelty of humankind — and perhaps realize that you yourself are capable of both. This will change you. Nothing will ever again be black-and-white.
Author: Mark Jenkins

Quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow-mindedness.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Broad, wholesome, charitable views of men and things cannot be acquired by vegetating in one little corner of the earth all one's lifetime.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
Author: Martin Buber

Quote: Travel doesn't become adventure until you leave yourself behind
Author: Marty Rubin

Quote: I am not the same having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.
Author: Mary Anne Radmacher Hershey

Quote: Investment in travel is an investment in yourself.
Author: Matthew Karsten

Quote: Once the travel bug bites there is no known antidote, and I know that I shall be happily infected until the end of my life.
Author: Michael Palin

Quote: Travel is more than the seeing of sights; it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
Author: Miriam Beard

Quote: He who does not travel does not know the value of men.
Author: Moorish proverb

Quote: Every one of a hundred thousand cities around the world had its own special sunset and it was worth going there, just once, if only to see the sun go down.
Author: Murakami

Quote: Life begins at the end of your comfort zone.
Author: Neale Donald Walsch

Quote: You think you are making a trip, but soon it is making you – or unmaking you.
Author: Nicolas Bouvier

Quote: Every traveler creates the country where he travels.
Author: Nikos Kazantzakis

Quote: A mind that is stretched by a new experience can never go back to its old dimensions.
Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

Quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people just exist.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quote: Once you have traveled, the voyage never ends, but is played out over and over again in the quietest chambers. The mind can never break off from the journey.
Author: Pat Conroy

Quote: The best travelers seem to be those able to hold two or three inconsistent ideas in their minds at the same time, or able to regard themselves as at once serious persons and clowns.
Author: Paul Fussell

Quote: All the pathos and irony of leaving one's youth behind is implicit in every moment of travel: one knows that the first joy can never be recovered, and the wise traveler learns not to repeat successes but tries new places all the time.
Author: Paul Fussell

Quote: The wish to travel seems to me characteristically human: the desire to move, to satisfy your curiosity or ease your fears, to change the circumstances of your life, to be a stranger, to make a friend, to experience an exotic landscape, to risk the unknown.
Author: Paul Theroux

Quote: Tourists don't know where they've been. Travelers don't know where they're going.
Author: Paul Theroux

Quote: It is not the destination where you end up but the mishaps and memories you create along the way!
Author: Penelope Riley

Quote: Traveling tends to magnify all human emotions.
Author: Peter Hoeg

Quote: Travel is like love, mostly because it's a heightened state of awareness, in which we are mindful, receptive, undimmed by familiarity and ready to be transformed. That is why the best trips, like the best love affairs, never really end.
Author: Pico Iyer

Quote: He who returns from a journey is not the same as he who left.
Author: proverb

Quote: Travel has a way of stretching the mind. The stretch comes not from travel's immediate rewards, the inevitable myriad new sights, smells and sounds, but with experiencing firsthand how others do differently what we believed to be the right and only way.
Author: Ralph Crawshaw

Quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Do not follow where the path may lead. Go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Nature always wears the colors of the spirit
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Always do what you are afraid to do.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: Half the fun of the travel is the esthetic of feeling lost.
Author: Ray Bradbury

Quote: Those who follow the crowd usually get lost in it.
Author: Rick Warren

Quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I  I took the one less traveled by.
Author: Robert Frost

Quote: There are no foreign lands. It is the traveler only who is foreign.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: We are all travelers in the wilderness of this world, and the best we can find in our travels is an honest friend.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: Time flies. Its up to you to be the navigator.
Author: Robert Orben

Quote: We often discover a short way by a long wandering.
Author: Roger Ascham

Quote: If at some point you don't ask yourself  'What have I gotten myself into?' then you're not doing it right.
Author: Roland Gau

Quote: Long-term travel doesn't require a massive bundle of cash; it requires only that we walk through the world in a more deliberate way.
Author: Rolf Potts

Quote: Begin looking at maps with the narcotic tingle of possibility
Author: Rolf Potts

Quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is part of what inspires me to travel it.
Author: Rosalia de Castro

Quote: Travel is like a giant blank canvas, and the painting on the canvas is only limited by one's imagination.
Author: Ross Morley

Quote: Travel brings power and love back into your life. Things that seemed old are somehow new again.
Author: Rumi

Quote: Go forth on your path, as it exists only through your walking.
Author: Saint Augustine

Quote: The use of traveling is to regulate imagination by reality, and instead of thinking how things may be, to see them as they are.
Author: Samuel Johnson

Quote: Travel and change of place impart new vigor to the mind.
Author: Seneca

Quote: Travel expands the mind and fills the gap.
Author: Sheda Savage

Quote: The more I traveled the more I realized that fear makes strangers of people who should be friends.
Author: Shirley MacLaine

Quote: Life is short and the world is wide.
Author: Simon Raven

Quote: Two great talkers will not travel far together.
Author: Spanish proverb

Quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page.
Author: St. Augustine

Quote: Everywhere is within walking distance if you have the time.
Author: Stephen Wright

Quote: I haven't been everywhere,  but it's on my list.
Author: Susan Sontag

Quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
Author: Sydney J Harris

Quote: May your adventures bring you closer together, even as they take you far away from home.
Author: Trenton Lee Stewart

Quote: The journey not the arrival matters.
Author: T.S. Eliot

Quote: We shall not cease from exploration and the end of all our exploring will be to arrive where we started and know the place for the first time.
Author: T.S. Elliot

Quote: Make voyages. Attempt them. There's nothing else.
Author: Tennessee Williams

Quote: Make voyages. Attempt them. There's nothing else.
Author: Tennessee Williams

Quote: Why do you go away? So that you can come back. So that you can see the place you came from with new eyes and extra colors. And the people there see you differently, too. Coming back to where you started is not the same as never leaving.
Author: Terry Pratchett

Quote: A traveller must have the back of an ass to bear all, a tongue like the tail of a dog to flatter all, the mouth of a hog to eat what is set before him, the ear of a merchant to hear all and say nothing.
Author: Thomas Nashe

Quote: A journey is best measured in friends, rather than miles.
Author: Tim Cahill

Quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
Author: Tom Stoppard

Quote: We must take adventures in order to know where we truly belong.
Author: unknown

Quote: A thing is alive because it moves from place to place.
Author: unknown

Quote: We may run, walk, stumble, drive, or fly, but let us never lose sight of the reason for the journey, or miss a chance to see a rainbow on the way.
Author: unknown

Quote: The sky is not even the limit for you. There are footprints on the moon. Go. Explore.
Author: unknown

Quote: If we travel simply to indulge ourselves we are missing some of the greatest lessons life has to offer.
Author: unknown

Quote: To get something you never had, you have to do something you never did.
Author: unknown

Quote: It's is big world out there,  it would be a shame not to experience it.
Author: unknown

Quote: If you think adventure is dangerous, try routine, it's lethal
Author: Unknown

Quote: I would rather own a little and see the world, than own the world and see a little of it.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Don't quit your daydream.
Author: Unknown

Quote: You can shake the sand from your shoes, but not from your soul.
Author: Unknown

Quote: It is good to have an end to journey towards, but is the journey that matters in the end.
Author: Ursala La Guin

Quote: Venture forth; see what fate brings.
Author: Vietnamese Proverb

Quote: Nobody can discover the world for somebody else. Only when we discover it for ourselves does it become common ground and a common bond and we cease to be alone.
Author: Wendell Berry

Quote: The world is full of magic things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
Author: W.B. Yeats

Quote: The open road is a beckoning, a strangeness, a place where a man can lose himself.
Author: William Least Heat Moon

Quote: When you're traveling, you are what you are right there and then. People don't have your past to hold against you. No yesterdays on the road.
Author: William Least Heat Moon, Blue Highways

Quote: A ship in a harbor is safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
Author: William Shedd

Quote: A man of ordinary talent will always be ordinary, whether he travels or not; but a man of superior talent will go to pieces if he remains forever in the same place.
Author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Quote: You got to be careful if you don't know where you're going, because you might not get there.
Author: Yogi Berra

Quote: The important thing is not to stop questioning. Curiosity has its own reason for existing.
Author: Albert Einstein

Quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched  they must be felt with the heart.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: Still round the corner, there may wait, a new road or a secret gate.
Author: J. R. R. Tolkien

Quote: Paris is always a good idea.
Author: Audrey Hepburn

Quote: Our footprints always follow us on days when its been snowing. They always show us where weve been, but never where were going.
Author: Winnie the Pooh

Quote: Nothing lasts forever, except the day before you start your vacation.
Author: Gayland Anderson

Quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments and places that take our breath away.
Author: unknown

Quote: If we were meant to stay in one place, wed have roots instead of feet.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Im not lost, Ive just temporarily lost sight of my destination.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: I never travel without my diary. One should always have something sensational to read in the train.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quote: Experience, travel  these are as education in themselves.
Author: Euripides

Quote: When you travel, remember that a foreign country is not designed to make you comfortable.
Author: Clifton Fadiman

Quote: Work, Travel, Save, Repeat
Author: Anonymous

Quote: When preparing to travel, lay out all your clothes and all your money. Then take half the clothes and twice the money.
Author: Susan Heller

Quote: Can we just skip to the part of my life where I travel the world?
Author: Unknown

Quote: Vacation calories dont count. Right?
Author: Unknown

Quote: I want someone to look at me the way I look at a travel magazine.
Author: Unknown

Quote: I need six months of vacation, twice a year.
Author: Unknown

Quote: The worst thing about being a tourist is having other tourists recognize you as a tourist.
Author: Russell Baker

Quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
Author: Susan Sontag

Quote: Remember that happiness is a way of travel  not a destination.
Author: Roy M. Goodman

Quote: Perhaps travel cannot prevent bigotry, but by demonstrating that all peoples cry, laugh, eat, worry, and die, it can introduce the idea that if we try and understand each other, we may even become friends.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: A person susceptible to wanderlust is not so much addicted to movement as committed to transformation.
Author: Pico Iyer

Quote: Jobs fill your pocket, but adventures fill your soul.
Author: Jamie Lyn Beatty

Quote: Blessed are the curious for they shall have adventures.
Author: Lovelle Drachman

Quote: Take only memories, leave only footprints.
Author: Chief Seattle

Quote: Live your life by a compass not a clock.
Author: Stephen Covey

Quote: Life is short and the world is wide.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Live life with no excuses, travel with no regret.
Author: Oscar Wilde

Quote: Its not what you look at that matters. Its what you see.
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didnt do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: Travel isnt always pretty. It isnt always comfortable. Sometimes it hurts, it even breaks your heart. But thats okay. The journey changes you; it should change you.
Author: Anthony Bourdain

Quote: If youre twenty-two, physically fit, hungry to learn and be better, I urge you to travel  as far and as widely as possible. Sleep on floors if you have to.
Author: Anthony Bourdain

Quote: It seems that the more places I see and experience, the bigger I realize the world to be. The more I become aware of, the more I realize how relatively little I know of it
Author: Anthony Bourdain

Quote: Travel is about the gorgeous feeling of teetering in the unknown.
Author: Anthony Bourdain

Quote: Travel far enough, you meet yourself.
Author: David Mitchell

Quote: Travel only with thy equals or thy betters; if there are none, travel alone.
Author: The Dhammapada

Quote: It doesnt matter where you are going. It matters who is beside you.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: Heres to all the places we have been. And heres to all the places we ll go.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: As soon as I saw you, I knew an adventure was about to happen.
Author: A. A. Milne, Winnie the Pooh

Quote: I wanted freedom, open air and adventure. I found it on the sea.
Author: Alaine Gerbault, Sailor

Quote: Why do we love the sea? It is because it has some potent power to make us think things we like to think.
Author: Robert Henri

Quote: Adventure is worthwhile
Author: Aesop

Quote: Twenty years from now, you will be more disappointed by the things you didnt do than those you did. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from safe harbor. Catch the wind in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover.
Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

Quote: Travelingit leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller.
Author: Ibn Battuta

Quote: Land was created to provide a place for boats to visit.
Author: Brooks Atkinson

Quote: The days pass happily with me wherever my ship sails.
Author: Joshua Slocum

Quote: I travel because seeing photos in books and brochures wasnt good enough for me. To be there, that was everything.
Author: Wiremu Ratcliffe

Quote: Its out there at sea that you are really yourself.
Author: Vito Dumas

Quote: Once a year, go someplace youve never been before.
Author: Dalai Lama

Quote: To move, to breathe, to fly, to float. To roam the roads of lands remote, to travel is to live.
Author: Hans Christian Anderson

Quote: People dont take trips, trips take people.
Author: John Steinbeck

Quote: The cure for anything is saltwater sweat, tears, or the sea.
Author: Isak Dinesen

Quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
Author: Wallace Stevens

Quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travels sake. The great affair is to move.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: It is not that life ashore is distasteful to me. But life at sea is better.
Author: Sir Francis Drake, Sea Captain

Quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
Author: Hillaire Belloc

Quote: Some people get lost for so long, that they forgot what it was like to be themselves. Find yourself again.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: With age, comes wisdom, with travel comes understanding.
Author: Sandra Lake

Quote: The journey, not the arrival matters.
Author: T.S. Eliot

Quote: Im not afraid of storms for Im learning how to sail my ship.
Author: Louise May Alcott

Quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: May your adventures bring you closer together, even as they take you far away from home.
Author: Trenton Lee Stewart

Quote: Once the travel bug bites there is no known antidote, and I know that I shall be happily infected until the end of my life.
Author: Michael Palin

Quote: Travel is fatal to prejudice, bigotry, and narrow mindedness.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: The world is a book and those who do not travel read only a page.
Author: Hellen Keller

Quote: Sunsets are proof that no matter what happens, every day can end beautifully.
Author: Kristen Butler

Quote: If one doesnt know to which port one is sailing, no port is favorable.
Author: Lucius Annaneus Seneca

Quote: The eye has to travel.
Author: Deena Vreeland

Quote: Ships at a distance have every mans wish on board.
Author: Zora Neale Hurston

Quote: Jobs fill your pocket, adventures fill your soul.
Author: Jamie Lyn Beatty

Quote: The real voyage of discovery consists not in seeing new landscapes, but in having new eyes.
Author: Marcel Proust

Quote: May you live all the days of your life.
Author: Jonathan Swift

Quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
Author: Hilaire Belloc

Quote: We travel, initially, to lose ourselves, and we travel, next to find ourselves.
Author: Pico Iyer

Quote: All journeys have secret destinations of which the traveler is unaware.
Author: Martin Buber

Quote: Take every chance in life, because some things only happen once.
Author: Karen Gibbs

Quote: In life, its not where you go, its who you travel with.
Author: Charles M. Schulz

Quote: A ship in harbor is safe, but thats not why ships were built.
Author: John A. Shedd

Quote: Ones destination is never a place, but a new way of looking at things.
Author: Henry Miller

Quote: The great difference between voyages rests not with the ships, but with the people you meet on them.
Author: Amelia A. Barr

Quote: Wherever you go becomes a part of you somehow.
Author: Anita Desai

Quote: Travel not to escape life, but so life doesnt escape you.
Author: Anonymous

Quote: I am not the same, having seen the moon shine on the other side of the world.
Author: Mary Ann Radmacher

Quote: You havent lived until youve sailed.
Author: David Sedaris

Quote: Travel makes one modest. You see what a tiny place you occupy in the world.
Author: Gustave Flaubert

Quote: Make time for travel. The memories will last a lifetime.
Author: Ilana Schattauer

Quote: The gladdest moment in human life, me thinks, is a departure into unknown lands.
Author: Sir Richard Burtun

Quote: Live in the sunshine, swim the sea, drink the wild air.
Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: We are tied to the ocean, and when we go back to the sea, whether it is to sail or to watch, we are going back from whence we came.
Author: John F. Kennedy

Quote: We must free ourselves of the hope that the sea will ever rest. We must learn to sail in high winds.
Author: Aristotle Onassis

Quote: I havent been everywhere, but its on my list.
Author: Susan Sontag

Quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched they must be felt with the heart.
Author: Hellen Keller

Quote: Of all the books in the world, the best stories are found between the pages of a passport.
Author: Unknown

Quote: One doesnt discover new lands without consenting to lose sight, for a very long time, of the shore.
Author: Andre Gide

Quote: Happiness is living each day as if it were the first day of your honeymoon and the last day of your vacation.
Author: Leo Tolstoy

Quote: One of the great things about travel is that you find out how many good, kind people there are.
Author: Edith Wharton

Quote: No literature is richer than that of the sea. No story more enthralling, no tradition is more secure.
Author: Felix Riesenberg

Quote: There is no unhappiness like the misery of sighting land again after a cheerful, careless voyage.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: If it wasnt for seasickness, all the word would be sailors.
Author: Charles Darwin

Quote: Nothing lasts forever, expect the day before you start your vacation.
Author: Gayland Anderson

Quote: Sailing takes me away to where Ive always heard it could be. Just a dream and the wind to carry me, and soon I will be free.
Author: Christopher Cross

Quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door.
Author: Milton Berle

Quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
Author: George Eliot

Quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
Author: Swami Sivananda

Quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
Author: Ben Okri

Quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
Author: Nido Qubein

Quote: I am not afraid of tomorrow, for I have seen yesterday and I love today!
Author: William Allen White

Quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
Author: Ella Fitzgerald

Quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
Author: Democritus

Quote: No matter what people tell you, words and ideas can change the world.
Author: Robin Williams

Quote: The only journey is the one within.
Author: Rainer Maria Rilke

Quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't.
Author: Jack Dempsey

Quote: When you get into a tight place and everything goes against you, till it seems as though you could not hang on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

Quote: When you have a dream, you've got to grab it and never let go.
Author: Carol Burnett

Quote: Light tomorrow with today!
Author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

Quote: Learning how to be still, to really be still and let life happen - that stillness becomes a radiance.
Author: Morgan Freeman

Quote: Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
Author: Warren Buffett

Quote: Every story I create, creates me. I write to create myself.
Author: Octavia E. Butler

Quote: The measure of who we are is what we do with what we have.
Author: Vince Lombardi

Quote: Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.
Author: Desmond Tutu

Author: Arthur Helps

Author: Muhammad Ali

Quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
Author: Martin Luther

Quote: If you believe in yourself and have dedication and pride - and never quit, you'll be a winner. The price of victory is high but so are the rewards.
Author: Bear Bryant

Author: Robert Browning

Quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: If I have seen further than others, it is by standing upon the shoulders of giants.
Author: Isaac Newton

Quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
Author: Rabindranath Tagore

Quote: Change your thoughts and you change your world.
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
Author: Edith Wharton

Quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
Author: Amelia Barr

Quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
Author: Audrey Hepburn

Quote: Let us make our future now, and let us make our dreams tomorrow's reality.
Author: Malala Yousafzai

Quote: Two roads diverged in a wood and I - I took the one less traveled by, and that has made all the difference.
Author: Robert Frost

Quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
Author: Tommy Douglas

Author: James E. Faust

Quote: The undertaking of a new action brings new strength.
Author: Richard L. Evans

Quote: If the world seems cold to you, kindle fires to warm it.
Author: Lucy Larcom

Quote: It's a moment that I'm after, a fleeting moment, but not a frozen moment.
Author: Andrew Wyeth

Quote: In oneself lies the whole world and if you know how to look and learn, the door is there and the key is in your hand. Nobody on earth can give you either the key or the door to open, except yourself.
Author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

Author: Kevyn Aucoin

Quote: If a man does not keep pace with his companions, perhaps it is because he hears a different drummer. Let him step to the music which he hears, however measured or far away.
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quote: Give light and people will find the way.
Author: Ella Baker

Quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

Quote: Out of difficulties grow miracles.
Author: Jean de la Bruyere

Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: Somewhere, something incredible is waiting to be known.
Author: Sharon Begley

Quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child, and one teacher can change the world.
Author: Malala Yousafzai

Quote: I believe every human has a finite number of heartbeats. I don't intend to waste any of mine.
Author: Neil Armstrong

Quote: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: Start by doing what's necessary; then do what's possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.
Author: Francis of Assisi

Quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
Author: Jimmy Dean

Quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

Quote: We know what we are, but know not what we may be.
Author: William Shakespeare

Quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
Author: Walt Whitman

Quote: Perfection is not attainable, but if we chase perfection we can catch excellence.
Author: Vince Lombardi
