Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
Author: Aristotle Onassis

Quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
Author: Aesop

Quote: Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
Author: Buddha

Quote: When the sun is shining I can do anything; no mountain is too high, no trouble too difficult to overcome.
Author: Wilma Rudolph

Quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
Author: Andre Gide

Quote: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me.
Author: Zane Grey

Quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
Author: Anne Frank

Quote: I believe in living today. Not in yesterday, nor in tomorrow.
Author: Loretta Young

Quote: From its brilliancy everything is illuminated.
Author: Guru Nanak

Quote: Memories of our lives, of our works and our deeds will continue in others.

Quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
Author: Mahatma Gandhi

Author: Desiderius Erasmus

Author: Amelia Barr

Quote: Shoot for the moon and if you miss you will still be among the stars.
Author: Les Brown

Author: Georgia O'Keeffe

Quote: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
Author: Charles Morgan

Author: Arthur C. Clarke

Quote: You change your life by changing your heart.
Author: Max Lucado

Author: Plutarch

Author: Arthur C. Clarke

Quote: The best way out is always through.
Author: Robert Frost

Quote: Ideas shape the course of history.
Author: John Maynard Keynes

Author: Johannes Brahms

Author: Edward Young

Author: Alexander the Great

Author: Vincent McNabb

Author: Alan Alda

Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
Author: Jim Rohn

If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

Quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
Author: John Muir

Quote: From a small seed a mighty trunk may grow.
Author: Aeschylus

Author: Michael Jackson

Quote: The most beautiful thing in the world is, of course, the world itself.
Author: Wallace Stevens

Author: Arthur Young

Author: Buddha

Author: Ronald Reagan

Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Author: Jim Elliot

Author: Gustave Flaubert

Author: Nicolaus Copernicus

Author: John Wayne

Author: Helen Hayes

Author: Bernard Williams

Author: Francis of Assisi

Author: Anne Frank

Quote: The things that we love tell us what we are.
Author: Thomas Aquinas

Author: Tony Robbins

Quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
Author: Augustus Hare

Quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
Author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

Author: Hosea Ballou

Author: John F. Kennedy

Author: Plato

Author: Benjamin Franklin

Author: James Allen

Author: William Arthur Ward

Author: Francis Quarles

Author: John Ruskin

Author: Christa McAuliffe

Author: Robert Schumann

Author: e. e. cummings

Author: Thomas Fuller

Author: Ben Okri

Author: Robert Fulghum

Author: Anne Frank

Author: Bruce Lee

Quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
Author: Og Mandino

Author: Ken Hensley

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Author: Jules Renard

Quote: Grace is the beauty of form under the influence of freedom.
Author: Friedrich Schiller

Quote: Nurture your minds with great thoughts. To believe in the heroic makes heroes.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quote: And when I breathed, my breath was lightning.
Author: Black Elk

Author: Audrey Hepburn

Quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
Author: Arthur Balfour

Quote: If the doors of perception were cleansed everything would appear to man as it is, infinite.
Author: William Blake

Quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
Author: Arthur Ashe

Quote: What great thing would you attempt if you knew you could not fail?
Author: Robert H. Schuller

Quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
Author: Emile Zola

Quote: To the mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: What we think, we become.
Author: Buddha

Quote: I said to the almond tree, 'Friend, speak to me of God,' and the almond tree blossomed.
Author: Nikos Kazantzakis

Quote: I pray God may preserve your health and life many years.
Author: Junipero Serra

Quote: If you accept the expectations of others, especially negative ones, then you never will change the outcome.
Author: Michael Jordan

Quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
Author: Anais Nin

Quote: We have it in our power to begin the world over again.
Author: Thomas Paine

Quote: Follow your bliss and the universe will open doors where there were only walls.
Author: Joseph Campbell

Quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
Author: Victor Hugo

Quote: What makes the desert beautiful is that somewhere it hides a well.
Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

Quote: I believe there's an inner power that makes winners or losers. And the winners are the ones who really listen to the truth of their hearts.
Author: Sylvester Stallone

Quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.
Author: Emmet Fox

Quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
Author: Rabindranath Tagore

Quote: If we did all the things we are capable of, we would literally astound ourselves.
Author: Thomas A. Edison

Quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
Author: Earl Nightingale

Quote: I believe that one defines oneself by reinvention. To not be like your parents. To not be like your friends. To be yourself. To cut yourself out of stone.
Author: Henry Rollins

Quote: The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
Author: Bertrand Russell

Quote: The handicap of deafness is not in the ear; it is in the mind.
Author: Marlee Matlin

Quote: The only thing that ultimately matters is to eat an ice-cream cone, play a slide trombone, plant a small tree, good God, now you're free.
Author: Ray Manzarek

Quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Quote: Nothing is worth more than this day.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
Author: Albert Camus

Quote: Love the moment and the energy of that moment will spread beyond all boundaries.
Author: Corita Kent

Quote: Be not entangled in this world of days and nights; Thou hast another time and space as well.
Author: Muhammad Iqbal

Quote: Find out who you are and be that person. That's what your soul was put on this Earth to be. Find that truth, live that truth and everything else will come.
Author: Ellen DeGeneres

Quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
Author: Desmond Tutu

Quote: Countless as the sands of the sea are human passions.
Author: Nikolai Gogol

Quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
Author: John Muir

Quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
Author: Phillips Brooks

Quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
Author: Hermann Hesse

Quote: Reach for it. Push yourself as far as you can.
Author: Christa McAuliffe

Quote: Every day we should hear at least one little song, read one good poem, see one exquisite picture, and, if possible, speak a few sensible words.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
Author: Blaise Pascal

Quote: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
Author: Audre Lorde

Quote: We convince by our presence.
Author: Walt Whitman

Quote: Today is the only day. Yesterday is gone.
Author: John Wooden

Quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
Author: Pope John XXIII

Quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
Author: Henry Ward Beecher

Quote: Prayer is man's greatest power!
Author: W. Clement Stone

Quote: Miracles are a retelling in small letters of the very same story which is written across the whole world in letters too large for some of us to see.
Author: C. S. Lewis

Quote: Love and desire are the spirit's wings to great deeds.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.
Author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

Quote: Think with your whole body.
Author: Taisen Deshimaru

Quote: Show me your hands. Do they have scars from giving? Show me your feet. Are they wounded in service? Show me your heart. Have you left a place for divine love?
Author: Fulton J. Sheen

Quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
Author: Thomas Jefferson

Quote: Each day provides its own gifts.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quote: I thank you God for this most amazing day, for the leaping greenly spirits of trees, and for the blue dream of sky and for everything which is natural, which is infinite, which is yes.
Author: e. e. cummings

Quote: Just what future the Designer of the universe has provided for the souls of men I do not know, I cannot prove. But I find that the whole order of Nature confirms my confidence that, if it is not like our noblest hopes and dreams, it will transcend them.
Author: Henry Norris Russell

Quote: Keep all special thoughts and memories for lifetimes to come. Share these keepsakes with others to inspire hope and build from the past, which can bridge to the future.
Author: Mattie Stepanek

Quote: Silence is the last thing the world will ever hear from me.
Author: Marlee Matlin

Quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
Author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

Quote: There is a loftier ambition than merely to stand high in the world. It is to stoop down and lift mankind a little higher.
Author: Henry Van Dyke

Quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
Author: Anatole France

Quote: Live your beliefs and you can turn the world around.
Author: Henry David Thoreau

Quote: One today is worth two tomorrows.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.
Author: Wallis Simpson

Quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
Author: Thomas Merton

Quote: What we need is more people who specialize in the impossible.
Author: Theodore Roethke

Quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.
Author: Aeschylus

Quote: Hope is but the dream of those who wake.
Author: Matthew Prior

Quote: Yesterday we obeyed kings and bent our necks before emperors. But today we kneel only to truth, follow only beauty, and obey only love.
Author: Khalil Gibran

Quote: You don't look out there for God, something in the sky, you look in you.
Author: Alan Watts

Quote: A human being has so many skins inside, covering the depths of the heart. We know so many things, but we don't know ourselves! Why, thirty or forty skins or hides, as thick and hard as an ox's or bear's, cover the soul. Go into your own ground and learn to know yourself there.

Quote: I dwell in possibility.
Author: Emily Dickinson

Quote: Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
Author: Napoleon Hill

Quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
Author: Michelangelo

Quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
Author: Jean Paul

Quote: There are glimpses of heaven to us in every act, or thought, or word, that raises us above ourselves.
Author: Robert Quillen

Quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
Author: Richard Bach

Quote: We are here to make another world.
Author: W. Edwards Deming

Quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
Author: Henry Ward Beecher

Quote: Everyone here has the sense that right now is one of those moments when we are influencing the future.
Author: Steve Jobs

Quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
Author: William James

Quote: I celebrate myself, and sing myself.
Author: Walt Whitman

Quote: Act like you expect to get into the end zone.
Author: Christopher Morley

Quote: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.
Author: Hans Christian Andersen

Quote: I love those who yearn for the impossible.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
Author: Joseph Wood Krutch

Quote: And above all things, never think that you're not good enough yourself. A man should never think that. My belief is that in life people will take you at your own reckoning.
Author: Isaac Asimov

Quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
Author: Mother Teresa

Quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
Author: Dale Carnegie

Quote: It seems to me we can never give up longing and wishing while we are thoroughly alive. There are certain things we feel to be beautiful and good, and we must hunger after them.
Author: George Eliot

Quote: We can change our lives. We can do, have, and be exactly what we wish.
Author: Tony Robbins

Quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

Quote: People tell you the world looks a certain way. Parents tell you how to think. Schools tell you how to think. TV. Religion. And then at a certain point, if you're lucky, you realize you can make up your own mind. Nobody sets the rules but you. You can design your own life.
Author: Carrie-Anne Moss

Quote: The authentic self is the soul made visible.
Author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

Quote: Whatever ought to be, can be.
Author: James Rouse

Quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
Author: Unknown

Quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
Author: Tony Robbins

Quote: The fact that I can plant a seed and it becomes a flower, share a bit of knowledge and it becomes another's, smile at someone and receive a smile in return, are to me continual spiritual exercises.
Author: Leo Buscaglia

Quote: Your heart is full of fertile seeds, waiting to sprout.
Author: Morihei Ueshiba

Quote: Let each man exercise the art he knows.
Author: Aristophanes

Quote: On the recollection of so many and great favours and blessings, I now, with a high sense of gratitude, presume to offer up my sincere thanks to the Almighty, the Creator and Preserver.
Author: William Bartram

Quote: A concerted effort to preserve our heritage is a vital link to our cultural, educational, aesthetic, inspirational, and economic legacies - all of the things that quite literally make us who we are.
Author: Steve Berry

Quote: The leaders who we admire who have been able to bring great change in the past - Gandhi, Martin Luther King, Nelson Mandela - they're all inspirational religious leaders and smart tacticians. It would be nice to find the Muslim Gandhi, wouldn't it?
Author: Dennis C. Blair

Quote: Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.
Author: Skylar Grey

Quote: If you want to know why the coast is such an inspirational place, ask Herman Melville, Jack London, Nordhoff and Hall, Robert Louis Stevenson or Joseph Conrad. It's a glimpse of eternity. It invites rumination, the relentless whisper of the tide against the shore.
Author: John Cooper Clarke

Quote: I have amazing friends who have led inspirational lives.
Author: Andrew Shue

Quote: Look at a football field. It looks like a big movie screen. This is theatre. Football combines the strategy of chess. It's part ballet. It's part battleground, part playground. We clarify, amplify and glorify the game with our footage, the narration and that music, and in the end create an inspirational piece of footage.
Author: Steve Sabol

Quote: Brand is not a product, that's for sure; it's not one item. It's an idea, it's a theory, it's a meaning, it's how you carry yourself. It's aspirational, it's inspirational.
Author: Kevin Plank

Quote: Architecture is not an inspirational business, it's a rational procedure to do sensible and hopefully beautiful things; that's all.
Author: Harry Seidler

Quote: To be an Instagram model, you absolutely cannot just post pictures of yourself in a bikini for the sake of people seeing you in a bikini - even if that is exactly what you are doing. No, you need to caption these photos with an inspirational quote so that people will know that you are not just a butt, you're a gosh dang philosopher.
Author: Kat Timpf

Quote: Better to be called something positive and inspirational than something negative.
Author: Donnie Yen

Quote: I think anyone who has a passion for what they love to do, and who pursue it, is inspirational for me.
Author: Colin Morgan

Quote: The single most important thing in a child's performance is the quality of the teacher. Making sure a child spends the maximum amount of time with inspirational teachers is the most important thing.
Author: Michael Gove

Quote: I want to be motivational and inspirational for everybody: my big aim is more women on bicycles.
Author: Marianne Vos

Quote: Far too often, we have limited the definition of the Church. While not in all cases, in many cases, 'Church' has become an informational, inspirational weekly gathering rather than the group of people that God has ordained from Heaven to operate on his behalf on Earth in order to bring Heaven's viewpoint into history.
Author: Tony Evans

Quote: The most inspirational person in my life has been my mother.
Author: Nicole Maines

Quote: I believe in the city as a natural human environment, but we must humanize it. It's art that will re-define public space in the 21st Century. We can make our cities diverse, inspirational places by putting art, dance and performance in all its forms into the matrix of street life.
Author: Antony Gormley

Quote: It's music. It's supposed to be fun and inspirational. You have to be inspired. If I did it because it was my 'job,' and I only did it to make money, I don't think I'd still be doing it.
Author: Max Martin

Quote: One of the things that I did before I ran for president is I was a professional speaker. Not a motivational speaker - an inspirational speaker. Motivation comes from within. You have to be inspired. That's what I do. I inspire people, I inspire the public, I inspire my staff. I inspired the organizations I took over to want to succeed.
Author: Herman Cain

Quote: If you look at a building by Mies van der Rohe, it might look very simple, but up close, the sheer quality of construction, materials and thought are inspirational.
Author: David Chipperfield

Quote: It really is an honor if I can be inspirational to a younger singer or person. It means I've done my job.
Author: Aretha Franklin

Quote: It is such a luxury to open a new book that's highly recommended by friends - either an inspirational yet humorously self-deprecating memoir, or a page-turning piece of fiction.
Author: Kelli O'Hara

Quote: I used to think I was a gay man with this idea of a muse in my head, like a woman that I thought was inspirational or aspirational. But the woman was actually me.
Author: Hari Nef

Quote: I'm not an inspirational quote kind of person.
Author: Chrissy Teigen

Quote: Personally, I can't see the appeal in trekking down to D.C. for a networking extravaganza, even if it is built around a special moment in American history. While I find the election of Barack Obama inspirational, I don't have a desire to memorialize it with overly effusive celebration.
Author: Jamie Johnson

Quote: Rap music's been around for too long now to be inspirational. The words are, but the music isn't.
Author: Alexander McQueen

Quote: You can't go with the intention of writing something inspirational. You just have to go with the right heart.
Author: Lights

Quote: To me, the Seventies were very inspirational and very influential... With my whole persona as Snoop Dogg, as a person, as a rapper. I just love the Seventies style, the way all the players dressed nice, you know, kept their hair looking good, drove sharp cars and they talked real slick.
Author: Snoop Dogg

Quote: In sports teams, apart from talk of sporting prowess and the imparting of inspirational thought, an extraordinary amount of time is spent discussing, and flaunting, material possessions.
Author: Harsha Bhogle

Quote: Benazir Bhutto was an inspirational leader and an inspirational woman.
Author: Malala Yousafzai

Quote: We're in a situation where talented, motivated school leavers and graduates can send off a hundred CVs and not get a reply, and where a trip to the Job Centre is depressing rather than inspirational. And you know what, that just feels wrong.
Author: Jameela Jamil

Quote: 'Do What You Gotta Do' is a positive, inspirational song that says no matter what it is; whether you're up against challenges or trying to get your dreams and aspirations met, you should do what whatever you have to do shy of killing yourself or someone else.
Author: Angie Stone

Quote: Half a century ago, the amazing courage of Rosa Parks, the visionary leadership of Martin Luther King, and the inspirational actions of the civil rights movement led politicians to write equality into the law and make real the promise of America for all her citizens.
Author: David Cameron

Quote: The hymn 'Amazing Grace' is so inspirational - I wish I'd written it.
Author: Neil Sedaka

Quote: We work to create a new wave of feminism that is more inclusive. I want others to feel equal. It's so great to see women in positions of power, which is why other artists, such as Marilyn Minter, are so inspirational to me.
Author: Petra Collins

Quote: What's on my playlist when I'm fighting is not so much hip-hop. Sometimes, it's something more inspirational. I get a chance to think about what I'm fighting for, like, my family. It takes me to that state because a lot of times, it's a spiritual warfare for me.
Author: Tyron Woodley

Quote: I think being directed and mentored by someone as inspirational as Paul Feig not only improves my performance but, as a whole, makes it what it is.
Author: Nargis Fakhri

Quote: I had hoped when my life was chronicled, it would be an inspirational story.
Author: Om Puri

Quote: It's inspirational to see someone who is dying smile.
Author: Arlen Specter

Quote: I don't dislike rappers or hip-hop or people who like it. I went to the Def Jam tour in Manchester in the '80s when rap was inspirational. Public Enemy were awesome. But it's all about status and bling now, and it doesn't say anything to me.
Author: Noel Gallagher

Quote: I look up to a strong woman; maybe that's why I fell for Gaga. She works incredibly hard and is very strong and inspirational like Mom, with a great work ethic.
Author: Taylor Kinney

Quote: As people are walking all the time, in the same spot, a path appears.
Author: John Locke

Quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.
Author: William Ellery Channing

Quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
Author: Richard Bach

Quote: The essential elements of giving are power and love - activity and affection - and the consciousness of the race testifies that in the high and appropriate exercise of these is a blessedness greater than any other.
Author: Mark Hopkins

Quote: Create each day anew.
Author: Morihei Ueshiba

Quote: Of all human activities, man's listening to God is the supreme act of his reasoning and will.
Author: Pope Paul VI

Quote: Look within. Within is the fountain of good, and it will ever bubble up, if thou wilt ever dig.
Author: Marcus Aurelius

Quote: Not on one strand are all life's jewels strung.
Author: William Morris

Quote: I want to make this world perfect.
Author: Malala Yousafzai

Quote: Our ideals are our better selves.
Author: Amos Bronson Alcott

Quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson

Quote: The ideal life is in our blood and never will be still.
Author: Phillips Brooks

Quote: Once I knew only darkness and stillness... my life was without past or future... but a little word from the fingers of another fell into my hand that clutched at emptiness, and my heart leaped to the rapture of living.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: The books that help you most are those which make you think that most. The hardest way of learning is that of easy reading; but a great book that comes from a great thinker is a ship of thought, deep freighted with truth and beauty.
Author: Pablo Neruda

Quote: Mankind is made great or little by its own will.
Author: Friedrich Schiller

Quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
Author: Pope Paul VI

Quote: The Wright brothers flew right through the smoke screen of impossibility.
Author: Charles Kettering

Quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
Author: Donald Cargill

Quote: A lot of America is kind of done. People have been making films about it for 100 years. Everything to me feels used up. But Jo-Burg feels unbelievably inspirational to me.
Author: Neill Blomkamp

Quote: Space is an inspirational concept that allows you to dream big.
Author: Peter Diamandis

Quote: I think if there's something one needs to change with oneself, it doesn't have to happen in the New Year. You can do that any time you please - not that it's not a good inspirational tactic for the people that it works for.
Author: Brittany Murphy

Quote: When I was working at the Sprint store, I got laid off. I was bummed out, but I stayed positive. I used the money I had earned while working there to make my first album. Without that job, maybe 'Corazon Sin Cara' would never had been made. It's a very inspirational story.
Author: Prince Royce

Quote: Had I not come out with an inspirational CD, you perhaps would have never known that I feel like I feel, that all songs, all the music I've ever done is a gift from God.
Author: Smokey Robinson

Quote: Don't say I was an inspirational teacher - my former pupils would laugh their heads off. I was grossly incompetent, but I hope I didn't do the children a disservice.
Author: Greg Davies

Quote: I do a lot of inspirational talks for kids, to motivate them to change their lives and give them hope.
Author: Adam Beach

Quote: When Bill Clinton ran in '92, and I listened to him, and I had of course known of his record from Arkansas, I found him extraordinarily inspirational, and I voted Democratic.
Author: Wesley Clark

Quote: Business gives you a massive high. Doing a great deal, coming up with an inspirational solution... It's very addictive. But it doesn't last long. In isolation, it's a bit sterile. It doesn't reward the soul.
Author: John Caudwell

Quote: I may not have got the Nobel Prize, but I've won countless other awards, including 'Most Inspirational Living Woman Scientist.'
Author: Jocelyn Bell Burnell

Quote: Teachers need to be more inspirational. But it's also up to engineering to make itself more interesting.
Author: Bruce Dickinson

Quote: Traveling around the country, meeting fans and hearing their stories in person and on my radio show has reenergized my commitment to creating honest and inspirational content that not only serves my own creative purposes but can help and touch others as well.
Author: Nikki Sixx

Quote: I think the end goal, hopefully, is to take advantage of the attention I've gotten along the way and use it for good and build some communities, and as I get older I can continue to do things and be surrounded by things that are inspirational to me.
Author: Reggie Watts

Quote: Reading was very important to me as a kid. It was very inspirational to me. I went to a school where that wasn't encouraged so much, but my parents encouraged that, and it has made me part of who I am.
Author: Sasha Grey

Quote: Before the music and before the fame, I loved Apl for Allan Pineda, for being a brother that he is and for the inspiration - for him to actually come to the States from the Philippines and make something of his life. That's inspirational.
Author: Taboo

Quote: I used to make up stuff in my bio all the time, that I used to be a professional ice-skater and stuff like that. I found it so inspirational. Why not make myself cooler than I am?
Author: Stephen Colbert

Quote: Seeing RuPaul go out there and not only create music, but TV and film roles, and continue to go down so many creative avenues - that is inspirational. For a person of color like myself, I see RuPaul and I say, 'Oh, honey, I can do it too.'
Author: Shangela

Quote: I'd like to one day be featured on a list of inspirational people who have made a difference in the world, whether it be helping underprivileged people or putting an end to the poaching of wildlife in Africa.
Author: Candice Swanepoel

Quote: Silent pictures show us how we lived and what our attitudes were. And as an art form, they can be wonderfully entertaining and often inspirational.
Author: Kevin Brownlow

Quote: This CD became something of a personal journey for me. The tone of the whole CD is uplifting and inspirational. It's an upper. We have enough downers in the world.
Author: Roma Downey

Quote: I knew, regardless of anything else, singing in front of an orchestra was going to be inspirational. It would feed me.
Author: George Michael

Quote: I think that the reason for my success is that I am really not aspirational. I am inspirational in that the people at home feel like they can really relate to me.
Author: Rosie O'Donnell

Quote: When I started my career, I never looked at myself as one to be inspirational, but as I continued to grow, I've met so many different people who ask, 'How do you do it? You make it look easy.' But it's not easy. I have certain tricks and tips I use every day that have been working for me.
Author: Karen Civil

Quote: I'm a gay disabled man who has become very successful. I don't get up in the morning and think I'm inspirational; I just get up thinking that I love horses.
Author: Lee Pearson

Quote: I would probably work with Drake as he is massively inspirational to me as a writer as well as an artist. If not him, then Susan Boyle!
Author: Conor Maynard

Quote: My initial goal for the 1984 opening ceremonies was a show that would be majestic, inspirational, and emotional - a 20 goosebump experience.
Author: David L. Wolper

Quote: 'Ebony' is very inspirational and aspirational to its readers.
Author: Linda Johnson Rice

Quote: You are thinking about the music, about the mathematics of it. It's time-consuming and energy-consuming at the same time. That's why I take my time off, my family time, as inspirational. I cool off.
Author: Atif Aslam

Quote: Coming to Nashville has been so motivating and inspirational. Just watching people live and breathe their music and create something that they can feel from start to finish.
Author: Madi Diaz

Quote: By now, you've probably caught on to something: my mother is always standing by with just the right Scripture or inspirational saying to get me through any tough situation.
Author: Gabby Douglas

Quote: 'Star Wars' is fun, its exciting, its inspirational, and people respond to that. It's what they want.
Author: George Lucas

Quote: I don't really watch too many movies, but I try to watch inspirational pieces about other musicians. Musical documentaries truly inspire me.
Author: Syd

Quote: Can a person be inspirational? Does a person have global sensibility? That's the hardest thing to find.
Author: Anand Mahindra

Quote: I've never been a die-hard Beyonce fan. I always thought she was inspirational and beautiful.
Author: Winnie Harlow

Quote: Who would have thought that a tap-dancing penguin would outpoint James Bond at the box office? And deserve to? Not that there's anything wrong with 'Casino Royale.' But 'Happy Feet' - written and directed by George Miller - is a complete charmer, even if, in the way of most family fare, it can't resist straying into the Inspirational.
Author: Robert Gottlieb

Quote: I want to be an inspirational model. I want people to look at me and say, 'Wow, she looks healthy.'
Author: Ireland Baldwin

Quote: The power of pop culture stories should not be underestimated, and there is an enormous potential for inspirational stories that can have a positive, transformative effect on our lives.
Author: Anita Sarkeesian

Quote: I think that's a great opportunity, to pick a script where you can build up a good skill. I think the main thing I look for when I look at scripts is if it's inspirational. If it's something that teenagers can relate to. And is it something that the audience is going to get something out of. If not, then it's really not worth doing.
Author: Carly Schroeder

Quote: We have outstanding schools, world-class teaching and inspirational leadership across the country.
Author: Nicky Morgan

Quote: I have a 1969 Grammer Johnny Cash acoustic guitar, and it's so inspirational.
Author: Joe Bonamassa

Quote: 'Get along, go along' is not an inspirational philosophy, and only God knows how much moral cowardice it has covered up over the years. Serve your time, collect your chits, and cash 'em in for your home state? No, I'd say we could ask for more than that from our senators.
Author: Molly Ivins

Quote: I've lost count of the number of times that I've been approached by strangers wanting to tell me that they think I'm brave or inspirational, and this was long before my work had any kind of public profile.
Author: Stella Young

Quote: I love inspirational R&B, like Mary J. Blige and Jennifer Hudson. I want to do that. That kind of music stays with you.
Author: Ashthon Jones

Quote: Like the United Nations, there is something inspirational about New York as a great melting pot of different cultures and traditions. And if this is the city that never sleeps, the United Nations works tirelessly, around the clock around the world.
Author: Ban Ki-moon

Quote: When I am working out, I listen to inspirational speeches.
Author: Julian Edelman

Quote: I have a Children's Charity in Cuckfield, West Sussex, which helps young children affected by cerebral palsy and associated disorders. The perseverance these young people display every day is inspirational.
Author: Vera Lynn

Quote: The 'Dezeen's of this world are extremely inspirational but have no realistic dimension any more.
Author: Marcel Wanders

Quote: The way my father worked altruistically and the manner in which he used to go behind bars and come back home smilingly was inspirational.
Author: Asma Jahangir

Quote: I would say I'm an inspirational guidelines book. You can take my life story or scenarios or songs and relate to them and apply them to your everyday life.
Author: Chris Brown

Quote: When Maurice touched a keyboard, it was like something from a movie, magical. He would always give you something from a movie, and you'd go, what did you just play... immediately inspirational writings, amazing. That's what we're going to miss.
Author: Robin Gibb

Quote: My goal in my career is to inspire people, is to get my music out there and have people enjoy it, and have people think of me as an inspirational artist.
Author: Christina Grimmie

Quote: Sport is something that is very inspirational for young people.
Author: Pele

Quote: In fact, I wouldn't really call this a Gospel album, I call it more an inspirational album.
Author: Smokey Robinson

Quote: So I wanted to sing inspirational music, and that's exactly how I approached it - only the words have been changed to declare my relationship with God.
Author: Smokey Robinson

Quote: My father was very strict, a very militant parent, because he wanted us to be very focused kids. He sold the televisions, so we didn't watch TV. And he didn't want any music playing that wasn't gospel or inspirational music. In fact, he didn't even like a lot of gospel because he thought it was too bluesy.
Author: Lizz Wright

Quote: I think, aesthetically, car design is so interesting - the dashboards, the steering wheels, and the beauty of the mechanics. I don't know how any of it works, I don't want to know, but it's inspirational.
Author: Paloma Picasso

Quote: It is so inspirational, to see that in the world of Westeros, men are answering to women, and they are a force to be reckoned with. It's empowering, and it's inspirational as well, because you're just like, 'This is great!'
Author: Rose Leslie

Quote: I grew up in a bookless house - my parents didn't read poetry, so if I hadn't had the chance to experience it at school I'd never have experienced it. But I loved English, and I was very lucky in that I had inspirational English teachers, Miss Scriven and Mr. Walker, and they liked us to learn poems by heart, which I found I loved doing.
Author: Carol Ann Duffy

Quote: I wrote '('Til) I Kissed You' about a girl I met in Australia. Her name was Lilian, and she was very, very inspirational. I was married, but... I wrote the song about her on the way back home.
Author: Don Everly

Quote: Inside, I've got a real purist desire and dream about the music. I like the idea of being able to carve out a kind of magical, colourful, artistic, inspirational life. And the reality just turns out to be quite different, working with the business to bring this thing you have created into the world.
Author: Damien Rice

Quote: When I see a friend play Hamlet or see an inspirational performance, I absolutely get excited by the idea of changing things up.
Author: Andrew Lincoln

Quote: President Obama called for a 'we' nation in his Inauguration Address. Art convenes. It is not just inspirational. It is aspirational. It pricks the walls of our compartmentalized minds, opens our hearts and makes us brave. And that's what we need most in our country today.
Author: Anna Deavere Smith

Quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
Author: Aristotle

Quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
Author: Bo Jackson

Quote: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
Author: Carol Burnett

Quote: Every exit is an entry somewhere else.
Author: Tom Stoppard

Quote: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. 'Til your good is better and your better is best.
Author: St. Jerome

Quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
Author: Charles R. Swindoll

Quote: I can, therefore I am.
Author: Simone Weil

Quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
Author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
Author: John Burroughs

Quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
Author: H. G. Wells

Quote: Infuse your life with action. Don't wait for it to happen. Make it happen. Make your own future. Make your own hope. Make your own love. And whatever your beliefs, honor your creator, not by passively waiting for grace to come down from upon high, but by doing what you can to make grace happen... yourself, right now, right down here on Earth.
Author: Bradley Whitford

Quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
Author: Julie Andrews

Quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
Author: Muhammad Iqbal

Quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Author: Mark Twain

Quote: I am not a has-been. I am a will be.
Author: Lauren Bacall

Quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
Author: Winston Churchill

Quote: Well done is better than well said.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
Author: Wayne Dyer

Quote: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
Author: Pope John XXIII

Quote: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
Author: Stephen Hawking

Quote: Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try Again. Fail again. Fail better.
Author: Samuel Beckett

Quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
Author: Og Mandino

Quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
Author: Mark Caine

Quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
Author: Nikos Kazantzakis

Quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
Author: William Blake

Quote: Either I will find a way, or I will make one.
Author: Philip Sidney

Quote: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
Author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

Quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
Author: Gordon B. Hinckley

Quote: You simply have to put one foot in front of the other and keep going. Put blinders on and plow right ahead.
Author: George Lucas

Quote: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
Author: W. Clement Stone

Quote: If you don't design your own life plan, chances are you'll fall into someone else's plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
Author: Jim Rohn

Quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
Author: Walt Disney

Quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
Author: Robert H. Schuller

Quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
Author: Aldous Huxley

Quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
Author: Simone de Beauvoir

Quote: Knowing is not enough; we must apply. Willing is not enough; we must do.
Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

Quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
Author: Arthur Ashe

Quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
Author: Alfred A. Montapert

Quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
Author: John D. Rockefeller

Quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
Author: Walter Elliot

Quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
Author: Elon Musk

Quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
Author: Ken Venturi

Quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Author: Sam Levenson

Quote: I learned that we can do anything, but we can't do everything... at least not at the same time. So think of your priorities not in terms of what activities you do, but when you do them. Timing is everything.
Author: Dan Millman

Quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
Author: Bobby Knight

Quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
Author: Victor Kiam

Quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Author: Dalai Lama

Quote: A good plan violently executed now is better than a perfect plan executed next week.
Author: George S. Patton

Quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

Quote: Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
Author: H. L. Hunt

Quote: I am not afraid... I was born to do this.
Author: Joan of Arc

Quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
Author: Babe Ruth

Quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
Author: Ted Turner

Quote: I really believe that everyone has a talent, ability, or skill that he can mine to support himself and to succeed in life.
Author: Dean Koontz

Quote: Where there is a will, there is a way. If there is a chance in a million that you can do something, anything, to keep what you want from ending, do it. Pry the door open or, if need be, wedge your foot in that door and keep it open.
Author: Pauline Kael

Quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
Author: Kyle Chandler

Quote: I attribute my success to this - I never gave or took any excuse.
Author: Florence Nightingale

Quote: You will never win if you never begin.
Author: Helen Rowland

Quote: Never retreat. Never explain. Get it done and let them howl.
Author: Benjamin Jowett

Quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
Author: Benjamin Franklin

Quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Author: Confucius

Quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
Author: Theodore Roosevelt

Quote: Go big or go home. Because it's true. What do you have to lose?
Author: Eliza Dushku

Quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Author: William James

Quote: They can conquer who believe they can.
Author: Virgil

Quote: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
Author: Woodrow Wilson

Quote: Never complain and never explain.
Author: Benjamin Disraeli

Quote: Whatever you want in life, other people are going to want it too. Believe in yourself enough to accept the idea that you have an equal right to it.
Author: Diane Sawyer

Quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
Author: Michael Korda

Quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
Author: Lao Tzu

Quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Author: Confucius

Quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
Author: Tony Robbins

Quote: Don't think, just do.
Author: Horace

Quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Author: Les Brown

Quote: If you think you can do it, you can.
Author: John Burroughs

Quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
Author: Helen Keller

Quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
Author: Norman Vincent Peale

Quote: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
Author: George S. Patton

Quote: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
Author: Norman Ralph Augustine

Quote: You create your opportunities by asking for them.
Author: Shakti Gawain

Quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
Author: Natalie Gulbis

Quote: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud.
Author: Emile Zola

Quote: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
Author: Leo Buscaglia

Quote: If you don't ask, you don't get.
Author: Stevie Wonder

Quote: It is very important to know who you are. To make decisions. To show who you are.
Author: Malala Yousafzai

Quote: There's a way to do it better - find it.
Author: Thomas A. Edison

Quote: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
Author: Rabindranath Tagore

Quote: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
Author: Epictetus

Quote: Deserve your dream.
Author: Octavio Paz

Quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
Author: Ayn Rand

Quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
Author: John F. Kennedy

Quote: You never know what motivates you.
Author: Cicely Tyson

Quote: Never give up, for that is just the place and time that the tide will turn.
Author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

Quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
Author: Zig Ziglar

Quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
Author: Amelia Earhart

Quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
Author: Sophocles

Quote: Set your sights high, the higher the better. Expect the most wonderful things to happen, not in the future but right now. Realize that nothing is too good. Allow absolutely nothing to hamper you or hold you up in any way.
Author: Eileen Caddy

Quote: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
Author: Peter Marshall

Quote: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
Author: Maya Angelou

Quote: The people who influence you are the people who believe in you.
Author: Henry Drummond

Quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
Author: Allen Ginsberg

Quote: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
Author: Robert H. Schuller

Quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
Author: Sasha Cohen

Quote: Go for it now. The future is promised to no one.
Author: Wayne Dyer

Quote: There is progress whether ye are going forward or backward! The thing is to move!
Author: Edgar Cayce

Quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Author: Walt Disney

Quote: Step by step and the thing is done.
Author: Charles Atlas

Quote: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
Author: Nelson Mandela

Quote: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
Author: George Herbert

Quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
Author: Og Mandino

Quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
Author: Thomas A. Edison

Quote: To begin, begin.
Author: William Wordsworth

Quote: There is always room at the top.
Author: Daniel Webster

Quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
Author: Jim Rohn

Quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
Author: Philip Emeagwali

Quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
Author: Jessica Savitch

Quote: He conquers who endures.
Author: Persius

Quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.
Author: Richard Rorty

Quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
Author: Flip Wilson
